name: thy list
description:
Play with mouse and keyboard. F11 toggles fullscreen.

Your parents sent you on the quest of Thy Shopping List. You shall complete it by carefully using your savings and acquiring all the items. Meet strange folks, make choices and save a few coins to go to the arcade!

Music by xJackFox (from The Starlit Escape).
Silver, a font by Poppy Works.
Full credits.
